welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Forde, Norway! Get ready to experience the beauty of this charming city, known for its stunning landscapes and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Forde has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bringeland Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Bringeland Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sandane Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Flora Airport houses all check-in counters, security checkpoints, and departure gates.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Flora Airport handles all freight and cargo operations, including storage and loading onto aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
